title: 06/23/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/23/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Suns/Clippers game. The Clippers have overcome 2-0 deficits twice in these playoffs, but is it different this time? ESPN's Tim Legler joins us to explain whether he'd rather lose the way the Clippers lost last night or get blown out. And former NFL QB Mark Sanchez calls in to share the story of what really happened between him and Pete Carroll when he decided to leave USC for the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
